entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Ottawa (Kanata - Orléans)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle, 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 10:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Light Drizzle
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: N 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets or snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or periods of freezing rain changing to snow or ice pellets overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Ice pellets early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
